channel.title: New plugins not working? Help needed!
channel.description:
Ok, this is my new error, whenever i load start the server this shows up and I can't use my new EssentialsBan plugin or any new program i download.. but the ones I had before I upgraded worked fine, and before i uprgaded Bukkit and CraftBukkit and they never showed these errors.. Whats wrong??
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/sazfk2.png[/img]

item.title: New plugins not working? Help needed!
